comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage Monocle, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 72693550@N00
comment._content: On the card it reads: "Of her Prince Charming she had long dreamed And now wished to see him, so it seemed. Into the mirror she looked with delight, But the Prince she beheld gave her a fright."
